txt.en: Nimithil can be found in the lowest section of Ost Anglebed with her guards.\n\nYou have found a few pieces of concerning evidence in Ost Anglebed, and should return to Nimithil.
'This is most disturbing, [placeholder]...\n\n'Someone in Ost Anglebed must be behind this, but who... I cannot be certain. We must soon speak to the Steward of this matter.'
You have found a weapon rack stocked with only a few blunted blades...
The logs near the beacon of Anglebed have been doused...
This barricade has been burned despite no attacks being made against Ost Anglebed...

'Milonnen and my guards have spoken of strange happenings in Ost Anglebed, but I have yet to see any of them with my own eyes.

'Still, I do not doubt the truth to their words, and I would ask that you investigate this further, [placeholder]. They have spoken of ill-crafted weaponry and fragile defences about town, but I am certain more troubles have visited Ost Anglebed since this morn.

'Search thoroughly, and tell me of what you find.'
After hearing of many strange occurrences within Ost Anglebed from her guards, Nimithil has need of a discerning eye.
Search Ost Anglebed for signs of treachery ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ost Anglebed can be found in north-central Lebennin.\n\nNimithil has asked you to search Ost Anglebed for signs of treachery from within the guard.
